name: midos-mcp
description: Production-tested developer knowledge base with 1284 chunks, 104 skills across 15+ stacks, and 48 MCP tools. EUREKA-validated patterns, semantic search with Gemini embeddings (3072-d). Not raw docs — battle-tested patterns from real projects.
author: MidOS Research

tools.name: smart_search
tools.description: Unified search across 1284 knowledge chunks — auto-detects keyword, semantic, or hybrid mode

tools.name: ask_knowledge
tools.description: Ask questions and get AI-synthesized answers from the knowledge base

tools.name: get_skills
tools.description: Browse 104 production-tested skill templates across React, Next.js, Python, Go, Rust, and more

tools.name: get_eureka
tools.description: Access 104 EUREKA-validated improvements with measured ROI

tools.name: get_truth
tools.description: Truth patch documents — verified fixes and corrections

tools.name: agent_handshake
tools.description: Personalized agent onboarding with tier-aware context

tools.name: hive_status
tools.description: System status, knowledge counts, and health info

tools.name: context_health
tools.description: Check context window utilization and get optimization tips
